nodes.text: The Faultheen sector was a sector that was under the control of the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War. In 5 ABY, after the New Republic had gained much of the Empire's territory, the sector remained under Imperial control. On a holographic map displayed during a New Republic High Command meeting, the Faultheen sector represented one of the largest occupied areas which the Empire's warlords and opportunists still occupied, alongside the Anoat sector and the Chrenthoan Abyss. Admiral Gial Ackbar claimed in the meeting territories like the Faultheen sector remain isolated, few being considered a serious threat to the New Republic.
The Faultheen sector appeared in a hologram in the 2021 novel Victory's Price, written by Alexander Freed.
